mdRecord.dcterms:description: Prélude -- Capriccio -- Allegro molto -- Fantasia -- Chaconne -- Menuett : poco mosso -- Menuett : meno mosso.
For piano solo; originally composed for harpsichord.
Publication date derived from publisher's address. Cf. Handbook of early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro.
